name: Squirrel Away
description:
Eat things! As a squirrel! With friends! Or other squirrels!

• Choose from 12 squirrel species, 7 RGBCMYK themed squirrels and 2 dinosaurs!
• 1-4 Multiplayer: compete or cooperate with 3 CPU squirrels or total 4 human players in local multiplayer
• 16 Levels and more on the way!
• Beware of natural predators!
• Authentic retro 16bit console/arcade 2D graphics!
• Controllers supported: Xbox360, XboxOne, PS3, PS4, nVidia Shield TV

New in R1.022

• Fixed bug where playing in window mode would result in game window shrinking after every mouse press

New in R1.02

• 8 new squirrels and 2 dinosaurs to play as! Abert, African Smiths, Indian Giant Flying, Malaysian Black Giant, Northern Flying, Woolly Flying, Saber tooth Squirrel. Added Tyrannosaurus and Giganotosaurus
• Unlockable Dinosaur and Alpaca Costumes!
• Lots of bug fixes!

Look for future updates with more squirrels and levels

PC, Mac, Linux available for Download

Also available: Squirrel Emoji PNGs (66 in total)
